sources.name: wraglingdataset
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> wraglingdataset

sources.name: DelimitedText1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  DelimitedText1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared DelimitedText1 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://storageacct1010.blob.core.windows.net/data/input/dept.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(PromotedHeaders, {"deptname"}, {{"Count", each Table.RowCount(_), Int64.Type}})
in
  #"Grouped rows";
shared wraglingdataset = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://storageacct1010.blob.core.windows.net/data/input/employee.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = wraglingdataset,
  #"Merged queries" = Table.NestedJoin(Source, {"id"}, DelimitedText1, {"deptid"}, "DelimitedText1", JoinKind.FullOuter),
  #"Expanded DelimitedText1" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Merged queries", "DelimitedText1", {"deptid", "deptname"}, {"DelimitedText1.deptid", "DelimitedText1.deptname"}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Expanded DelimitedText1", {{"DelimitedText1.deptid", "deptid"}, {"DelimitedText1.deptname", "deptname"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
